text: Orangeburg is a hamlet and census-designated place, in the town of Orangetown, Rockland County, New York, United States. It is located north of Tappan, south of Blauvelt, east of Pearl River and west of Piermont. The population was 4,565 at the 2020 census. ==References== Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: Orangeburg, New York
